ygData.subject: Re: OOC r/l musical bards?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ahh, Its good to see that so many of us are really as intersested in music as our characters are.  Personally, I have sung and played guitar off and on in
ygData.messageBody:
Ahh,
Its good to see that so many of us are really as intersested in music as our
characters are. Personally, I have sung and played guitar off and on in
several bands in my area for the last 7 years. I have also helped record
and produce several of my friends' band's cd's (anyone ever heard of
Middlefinger?). I am now working with some ex-bandmates writing bit music
for indy films (horror mostly). I love my music in world and out. I only
wish it were as profitable in Real Life!!

Weiland of Freeport
Erollisi Marr


>
> > From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
> >
> > So we are all real good online Bards and have excellent musical
abilities
> to
> > the point of powerful magic, etc. But what about in /ooc real life?
> Anyone
> > have any talent or interest?
> >
